name: Running the Gauntlet (Working Title)
description:
Imelda is trying to organize a community event, but she needs approval from local officials. Help Imelda plead her case by hurling arguments at the bureaucrats!

Move with the arrow keys. Pick up Imelda's phrases (yellow rectangles) with SPACE, and throw them with E. 

Avoid the insults and discouragement (pink squares). Maybe you can redirect them...

Very early development. Developing for Foundations of Game Design class with:

Eliana Cadelina https://bookercatcheli.itch.io/
Monserrat Fausto https://mfausto8967.itch.io/

Programming: Monserrat Fausto, Malachi Maldonado
Art: Eliana Cadelina, Monserrat Fausto
